description: This file defines a theming class `AppTheme` for a Flutter application, centralizing the application's visual styling and color palette using Material 3 design principles. It provides a static getter for a light theme (`lightTheme`) with detailed customization of color scheme, AppBar, floating action button, bottom navigation bar, cards, input decorations, and text styles.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class that centralizes theming for the Flutter app, providing a static light theme configuration.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: A static method returning a `ThemeData` object configured with custom color scheme and UI component styles for a light theme.
